body: Great Community of Honeybee! This is just a reminder that a 3-week series of Honeybee webinar/workshops will begin this Thursday at 12:30 PM EDT.  There will be 6 90-minute webinars in total with 2 on energy/comfort, 2 on daylight/glare, and 2 on THERM/WINDOW.  All will fall on Tuesday and Thursday at the same time. We will be covering a wide range design exercised and going over much of the latest software development. Register below! [HONEYBEE ENERGY MODELING](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/7712200332230533890) [](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/7712200332230533890) [HONEYBEE DAYLIGHT MODELING](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/4181881800697644290) [](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/4181881800697644290) [HONEYBEE THERM MODELING](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/6190018842551590146) [](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/6190018842551590146)
topic: Reminder: Honeybee Webinar Workshops Start this Thursday
